page.title: 10THE POSTOFFICE LADY
page.content: COMMUNICATIONS The post office lady has lived in the village three and a half years .She was asked to do the job and she took it.She works on Tuesdays and Thursdays.She enjoys her work.The present post office has been open 4 years.The post office lady finds the village people friendly .She has not got another part_time job.30 people approximately served a day.She says the village needs a post office for the pensioners to get their pension.It would mean they would have to pay Â£2 for the bus.If she was not a postoffice lady she would not do another job. by Jenny & Becca.
